text: @realDonaldTrump @POTUS @POTUS So considering NY is in need the most and we are needed the most to start moving the economy back in the right direction, wouldn’t you say FACT is, you need to take care of NY immediately. Should be first on all priorities ... @NYGovCuomo #coronavirus
